description: This file defines a Minimax AI class for a chess game, implementing move evaluation using the negamax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning. It interacts with core game logic such as move generation and position evaluation.

classes.name: MinimaxAi
classes.description: A class implementing a minimax-based AI for chess, with methods to find the best move and evaluate positions.

methods.name: findBestMove
methods.description: Determines the optimal move for the current player using minimax search with alpha-beta pruning.

methods.name: negamax
methods.description: Recursive negamax function implementing the alpha-beta pruning logic for game tree search.

methods.name: evaluate
methods.description: Heuristic evaluation of a chess position, considering material balance, mobility, and check threats.
